sys_script.name: Populate NIST461 Signatures Auto Appr

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e0ed91391bf6a8d0b96a98ad9c4bcb20
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sysapproval_approver">state=approved^source_tableSTARTSWITHx_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order^EQ<item display_value="Approved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="approved"/><item endquery="false" field="source_table" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate NIST461 Signatures Auto Appr</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_g_ni4_interdivis_interdivision_work_order");
	gs.info('YZN461 ' + current.document_id + current.wf_activity.name);
	gr.get(current.document_id);
	if (current.wf_activity.name == 'Debit AO Approval') {		
		gr.debit_ao_approver = current.approver;
		gr.debit_ao_approved_date = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.wf_activity.name == 'Credit AO Approval') {
		gr.credit_ao_approver = current.approver;
		gr.credit_ao_approved_date = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.wf_activity.name == 'Debit SMA Approval') {
		gr.sma_approver = current.approver;
		gr.sma_approved_date = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.wf_activity.name == 'Budget Approval') {
		gr.budget_approver = current.approver;
		gr.budget_approved_date = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
	} 
	gr.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pazhangy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-10 13:32:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e0ed91391bf6a8d0b96a98ad9c4bcb20</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate NIST461 Signatures Auto Appr</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Interdivision Work Order" source="x_g_ni4_interdivis">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Interdivision Work Order">bd43f2a41bc6ac507562a7dcac4bcb29</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e0ed91391bf6a8d0b96a98ad9c4bcb20</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>pazhangy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-10 13:47:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>
